hero.title: Document Translation
hero.subtitle: powered by AI
hero.description: Preserve formatting, support specialized glossary. Translate Word, PDF, Excel 10x faster than manual.

format.title: Preserve original formatting
format.description: Tables, images, headers/footers are perfectly preserved. Export files in the original format.

glossary.title: Smart Glossary
glossary.description: Create and manage specialized term dictionaries. Ensure consistent terminology throughout the document.

speed.title: 10x Faster
speed.description: Process 50-page documents in just minutes. Save hours of work every day.

review.title: Bilingual Review
review.description: Two-column interface for comparing original and translated versions. Easy inline editing.

ocr.title: Image OCR
ocr.description: Recognize and translate text in images. Support for high-quality document scanning.

savings.title: Save 80% on costs
savings.description: Cost only 1/5 compared to hiring translators. Clear ROI from the first month.

painPoints.title: Are you facing these problems?
painPoints.subtitle: These are issues thousands of users experienced before finding AnyTrans

format.title: Lost formatting when translating PDF
format.description: Tables, images, layout completely broken after translation

time.title: Takes too much time
time.description: Manual translation takes hours, even days for long documents

cost.title: High translation costs
cost.description: Hiring professional translators is expensive, doesn't fit budget

upload.title: Upload document
upload.description: Drag and drop or select PDF, Word, or Excel files. Supports files up to 100MB.

configure.title: Configure translation
configure.description: Choose target language, specialized glossary, and format options.

download.title: Download result
download.description: Receive translated file with preserved formatting. Review and edit if needed.

pricingSection.title: Simple pricing,
pricingSection.subtitle: pay as you go
pricingSection.description: Buy credits once, use without time limit. Buy more, pay less.

items.name: Nguyen Van Minh
items.content: AnyTrans has helped our team save dozens of hours every week. Translation quality exceeded expectations, especially for technical documents.

items.name: Tran Thi Huong
items.content: The specialized glossary feature is a game-changer. Legal terms are translated accurately and consistently throughout the 200-page contract.

items.name: Le Quang Huy
items.content: Translating a 300-page scientific thesis used to take weeks. With AnyTrans, we finished in under an hour with all formulas and charts perfectly preserved. A game-changer for academic publishing.

items.name: Pham Thi Mai
items.content: Academic document translation requires high accuracy. AnyTrans is not only fast but also preserves complex formulas and charts.

items.name: Dang Minh Tuan
items.content: Smooth API integration, clear documentation. Integrated into our internal system within 2 days. Highly recommended!

items.name: Vu Hoang Anh
items.content: Translated 500-page technical manual in just 30 minutes with perfect formatting. Extremely professional support team.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your needs

hero.title: Simple pricing,
hero.subtitle: pay only for what you use
hero.description: 1 Credit = 1 page translated. No subscription. No time limit.

enterpriseSection.title: Enterprise & Volume Pricing
enterpriseSection.description: Need more than 10,000,000 credits? We offer custom pricing for enterprises.
enterpriseSection.enterpriseDesc: Custom solutions for large businesses with committed SLA

banner.title: Ready to translate 10x faster?
banner.subtitle: 1 Credit = 1 page translated. No subscription. No time limit.

faqItems.question: Do credits expire?
faqItems.answer: No. Credits have no expiration date, you can use them anytime.

faqItems.question: Can I use it for my team?
faqItems.answer: Yes. Pro plan supports team access, or contact Enterprise for customized solutions.

faqItems.question: How many credits for a 200-page PDF?
faqItems.answer: 200 credits. Each page = 1 credit, calculated by the actual number of pages in the document.

faqItems.question: How are API credits calculated?
faqItems.answer: Each page via API = 1 credit, same as using the web interface.

faqItems.question: Is there a refund policy?
faqItems.answer: Credits are non-refundable, but you can try for free before purchasing.
